sent.orig: You might as well advise me to give up my fortune as my argument.

sent.orig: Some practitioners advise sinking the fence netting 30 centimetres into the soil.

sent.orig: I don't advise you go have recourse to the money-lenders.
sent.trans: 我劝你不要求助于放债的人。

sent.orig: UN001, (Ramp Control), roger, I will advise someone to check.
sent.trans: UN001，（现场），明白，我叫人去看一看。

sent.orig: After fifteen years of teaching,he was seconded to the Ministry of Education to advise them on school planning.
sent.trans: 任教15年后，他被调到教育部协助制定教育规划。
